content: pattern is for a reversible pokeball that flips into a dragonite pokemon materials hooks for majority of pattern 3 25 mm/us d/3 for chain stitches at opening 4 00 mm/us g/6 yarn worsted weight yarn i use caron simply soft pokeball colors - red caron harvest red black caron black white caron white dragonite colors - yellow caron gold off-white i would describe it as cream colored caron off white dark teal caron pagoda tan caron bone white caron white small amount of dark green caron dark sage small amount of black caron black yardage the finished piece weighs 106 grams there is a small amount of stuffing but i estimate that is 188 yards of yarn but i do not know how much for each color small amount of fiberfill stuffing do not over stuff sewing notions tapestry needle sewing needle black and yellow 6 in 15 24 cm zippers 7 sewing pins to help hold zipper on the pokeball while you sew sewing thread in red white yellow and white for shaping the horns
